recipe.title: Tarragon-Caper Egg Salad Sandwiches with Smoked Salmon
ingredients: 2 tablespoons drained capers, rinsed and finely chopped
6 (4- to 5-inch) soft round seeded rolls, split
instructions: Mash eggs coarsely with a fork, then stir in shallot, tarragon, capers, mayonnaise, and salt and pepper to taste. Make sandwiches with rolls, egg salad, watercress, and salmon.
